project.description: Create a Supertimeline with plaso for analysis

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DISK_IMAGE_FILE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Location of the disk image to create the supertimeline from

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CASE_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the case - used to build the output path.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OUTPUT_LOCATION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Location of the supertimeline output file

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TIMEZONE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Timezone of the system being analysed.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: if [[ ! -d $OUTPUT_LOCATION ]]; then mkdir $OUTPUT_LOCATION; fi log2timeline.py ${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/plaso.dump $DISK_IMAGE_FILE psort.py -z$TIMEZONE -o L2tcsv -w ${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/supertimeline.csv ${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/plaso.dump
